title: Golden Chocolate Oreo Cookie Review: Oreo Oration
description:
Golden Oreo week continues with the Golden Chocolate Oreo cookie getting a full Oreo Oration review.

SUBSCRIBE / LIKE / SHARE

While you were living your life, Nabisco went crazy and made an army of Oreo cookies. Every Wednesday and Friday, Greg Miller tears open a new package and reviews a new version of Milk's Favorite Cookie. 

Subscribe so you don't miss a review. 

Leave your review of today's cookie as a video response.

Let us know what Oreo we should review next in the comments.

Follow Greg on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/gameovergreggy

Like Greg on Facebook: http://facebook.com/gameovergreggy

Our theme is "Game-A-Tron" off of Daemon Hatfield's album Colorbeam. Buy it on iTunes: https://itunes.apple.com/us/album/colorbeam/id426986325

Thanks to Nick and Tim for filming.

Mega-Thanks to Matt Gravish for making the Oreo Oration logo and intro.

transcript_chunks.text: what's up everybody welcome to Oreo aeration I'm Greg Miller and while you are out living your life staring at them pretty girls on the youtubes the fine people at or you are making endless variations of milks favorite cookie so every Wednesday and Friday I tear open a new package and give you a tasty review without any calories if you like that like the video and subscribe to my channel today we're reviewing golden chocolate Oreo that's right ladies and gentlemen the last time around is golden this is golden cookie week here on you know the Oreo raishin last time we had the regular old white in the middle white on the outside but now look at golden chocolate every Oreo raishin begins with the first look using the patented Nabisco seal here are you getting tricky yummy Nabisco what what do I do if I can't get into bits Co that's the big question well here we go well you're losing points on the first look right now cuz I can't open the package what if I was at home hungry now here we go

I do if I can't get into bits Co that's the big question well here we go well you're losing points on the first look right now cuz I can't open the package what if I was at home hungry now here we go firstly alright alright look look what we got going here again they're all here they're all uniform no breaks no split cookies that's what you want let's get a small bouquet not strong okay either way that's interesting of course you know on the regular golden cookie it was the cookie that really spoke but right now it seems the chocolate in the cookie here they're cancel each other out I can't get a good smell let's see what I can get in our next segment taste there we go now look at how it looks okay oh I'm excited about this cookie know again the yeah the outside cookie sugar ish short British sweet that's what you initially get lettuce you continue to chew and mull over all the taste in your mouth the chocolate really comes out I can taste it right now as an advertised that's dynamite

sweet that's what you initially get lettuce you continue to chew and mull over all the taste in your mouth the chocolate really comes out I can taste it right now as an advertised that's dynamite I'm a big fan of this one so far let's see up next of course how does it pair with milk a big part of every Oreo cookie how's the pay with note remember last time we had the golden oriole on the show it didn't go well for the milk test because it didn't absorb the milk you what the way you want I don't know that's gonna change here that we have the chocolates on the inside I'll give her the traditional few dippity-doo dogs here and here gonna pull it out see what we got yeah I'm okay a few extra dippity-do does there come he really took it a soggy your cookie still - Auggie's I think the chocolate cookie would be but then we saw here than the golden was the first time around so something about the cream maybe the duration of the dippity-do - but I thought I gave the same one again really

cookie would be but then we saw here than the golden was the first time around so something about the cream maybe the duration of the dippity-do - but I thought I gave the same one again really happy with the taste the chocolate obviously going well with the milk the shortbreads sweet cookie going well with just everything I guess let's check now with the twist this is another key part of any Orie I want to twist it yeah another split another bad bad split not a fan of that like I say I was give two or three it's even got a better split on this one no no it's still pretty bad not as bad they see on that one at least you get the majority if you want it to make your old double stuff it's more of like a 1 in 3/4 double stuff not not a great one not exactly what you want but good enough now comes the hardest part of the show the scoring of course the golden got an 8.5 I review on the 20-point scale so I've just sighed as an 8.5 again or a 9 giving it a 9 that's right snap judgment the

comes the hardest part of the show the scoring of course the golden got an 8.5 I review on the 20-point scale so I've just sighed as an 8.5 again or a 9 giving it a 9 that's right snap judgment the char the taste is what I'm looking on it and that taste category when I get the chocolate aftertaste I get the nice sweet bread cookie right this front of my tongue it's dynamite for your palate highly recommended 9.0 so that's the way the cookie crumbles for golden chocolate Oreos but what do you think leave your review as a video response below like the video subscribe to my channel and then what I need you for the most ladies and gentlemen are their Oreos out there I'm missing I'm sure they are they seem unloved they don't know that I'm looking for them wanting to consume them and score them in a brutally harsh manner in the comments below please leave any Oreos I'm missing then tell your friends share this video with them I'll be back every Wednesday and Friday until I run out of
